about_the_game:
Philly welcomes you to Degen Royale. You and your fellow companions are chosen from the world's best and brightest to compete against one another on the tropical Degen Island. As you beam onto the Island you will be equiped with the most wacky guns and gadgets immaginable to compete in an exciting free-for-all deatchmatch called "Rumbles". Only one elite player can win in this third-person shooter that up to 100 online players can join. Unlimited ammo, unlimited respawns, unlimited fun together.

Pick your character
Participate in the Island Rumbles with an Ape avatar.

Wacky weapon
Become the number one survivor using your Banana Blaster to shoot other players.

Free-for-All Rumbles
Up too 100 online players can participate in an free-for-all deathmatch third-person shooter on the island.
detailed_description:
Philly welcomes you to Degen Royale. You and your fellow companions are chosen from the world's best and brightest to compete against one another on the tropical Degen Island. As you beam onto the Island you will be equiped with the most wacky guns and gadgets immaginable to compete in an exciting free-for-all deatchmatch called "Rumbles". Only one elite player can win in this third-person shooter that up to 100 online players can join. Unlimited ammo, unlimited respawns, unlimited fun together.

Pick your character
Participate in the Island Rumbles with an Ape avatar.

Wacky weapon
Become the number one survivor using your Banana Blaster to shoot other players.

Free-for-All Rumbles
Up too 100 online players can participate in an free-for-all deathmatch third-person shooter on the island.

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Mac OS X 10.7 (Lion)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: GSX 1000 PRO
  • Additional Notes: Let's play and have fun.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: SIERRA (10.12)
  • Processor: Apple M1
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon RX 6600 XT
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 MB available space
  • Sound Card: GSX 1000 PRO

name: Degen Royale

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 1507
  • Processor: Intel Core i3
  • Memory: 4000 MB RAM
  • Graphics: Nvidia 760
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound BlasterX G6 Hi-Res
  • Additional Notes: Let's play and have fun.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: 1507
  • Processor: Intel Core i9
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 8 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Sound BlasterX G6 Hi-Res
  • Additional Notes: Let's play and have fun.

short_description: We welcome you to Degen Royale, a First-Person-Shooter taking place on the tropical Degen Islands. We bring the FUN back into the gaming experience. Join us in whacky online rumbles with your friends and see if you can become the Degen Royale champion.
